ai-patthana23.30:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.30:0.3_0: I am skilled in profitable things,
ai-patthana23.30:1.1_0: Not for the sake of subduing an expansion is a cause of skillful quality.
ai-patthana23.30:2.1_0: Not by way of body, speech, or mind arises conditioned by those who are unskillful.
ai-patthana23.30:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.30:3.1_0: Not answering, or principles hasn’t been declared by the Teaching.
